==== About me ====
My name is Jens Maucher and live in Kronau, Germany. My first contact with linux was 2002 with debian woody.
Since 2004 (Ubuntu 4.10) I am in touch with Ubuntu. Professionally i am a Bachelor Professional of Electrical Technology and Management (CCI)and furthermore IT specialist system integration. I am proud to be a part of the great community.
